plot: A fantasy tale about the "unbearable lightness of power". What is it like to be a King? Robb the Jester is going to step up into more regal costumes to find out it.
title: Being a King
plot_es: A fantasy tale about the "unbearable lightness of power". What is it like to be a King? Robb the Jester is going to step up into more regal costumes to find out it.
plot_en: A fantasy tale about the "unbearable lightness of power". What is it like to be a King? Robb the Jester is going to step up into more regal costumes to find out it.
